org.waarp.openr66.protocol.localhandler.packet
Class RequestPacket

java.lang.Object
  org.waarp.openr66.protocol.localhandler.packet.AbstractLocalPacket
      org.waarp.openr66.protocol.localhandler.packet.RequestPacket

public class RequestPacket
extends AbstractLocalPacket

Request class header = "rulename MODETRANS" middle = way+"FILENAME BLOCKSIZE RANK specialId code" end = "fileInformation"

Author:
frederic bregier
